actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 to provide for certain land exchange agreements, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to execute land exchanges for equal value or to enter agreements fixing boundaries to clear title to lands owned or held in trust by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 to provide for certain land exchange agreements, and for other purposes.
